website_summaries.verdict: The Camelot is a high quality, feature-rich deadbolt, but you'd be smart to wait and compare it against the coming glut of smart locks due out in the coming months.
pros: The Schlage Camelot Touchscreen Deadbolt boasts stylish looks, and a a wide variety of high-tech home automation features, making it one of the most functional locks you can get
cons: Taking full advantage of those home automation features means spending an additional $60 on a Nexia Bridge, along with an off-putting $9.99 monthly fee

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the lock on multiple levels
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the lock on multiple levels. It worked remotely with my Smartthings Hub, it was reliable, and looked good. However, 1-1/2 years later, the touchscreen panel just went dead and that's unacceptable on a $190 deadbolt. The *electronics* part of the warranty is only 1 year... go figure. (and yes, I changed the batteries out a couple of months ago, and they were at 98% when the panel went dead). If you rely on the electronics (and don't carry a key as a result), and it fails... well... To be fair, there *is* a newer version of this out now, called the Connect. That carries a 3-year warranty on the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Confounded Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Smart lock out of the box, super smart when used with Samsung Smartthings
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. This one is actually my second schlage lock. The convenience factor for these locks is life changing. If you have Samsung Smartthings, look into scripts that will push this to the next level. I'm talking features like burner codes, remote code programming, per user notifications, per code events, etc... If any of you are wondering about battery life, it's amazing. Been running my first one for a month now and it's only dropped 1%.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiyoti

customer_reviews.title: Great electronic deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: I love this deadbolt. I love anything that makes my home an easier place to live for me and my family. My kids can easily enter the code and the deadbolt unlocks. They don't have to worry about being locked out or forgetting a key. I can also give our housekeepers a code so that they can get in the house when I am not home. I like that I don't have to bring a key with me wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Don’t do what I did and over think ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Don’t do what I did and over think it. I spent an hour trying to figure out how to switch it from left to right hand. Turns out, if you follow the setup procedure, it automagically detects the orientation. I had never seen that before. To switch it, do a factory reset and repeat setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Picked this one out of the many that were available - ended up being the right one! My wife was skeptical about it and was nervous about breaking it or not remembering her code, but after using it for a few months she now swears by it and made me get another one for the back door! We both agree this is so much better than carrying keys everywhere you go, plus being able to check it on my smartphone and tie it into the security system makes this a very convenient and versatile lock.
customer_reviews.author: B. Proulx

customer_reviews.title: Great smart device!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, but it look a while to sync it with my Wink2 hub. I really couldn't say if it was the product, or the hub that was having the issue. Once I got it synced, I have not had any issues. and it works awesome. Purchased 6 months ago and have not had to replace the batteries yet. I like the log that shows what times it was opened and closed, and which code was used or if the app was used. If I was going to be really critical, I would say that the motor is a little loud, not bad loud, but I would think it could be a little quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Ske

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pairing with SmartThings
customer_reviews.text: This one worked for a long time with SmartThings. Then we had it offline for a couple of months when we moved, reinstalled it with the SAME hub, and it suddenly refused to pair with SmartThings. We even got a new hub in case that was the issue. Nothing we did worked. Schlage had to send us out a new lock with a button on the circuit board which this one DOES NOT HAVE. Beware. Not sure why the new one worked so easily and this one suddenly decided it wouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've installed a few electronic locks in the past and they are all pretty much the same so this was very straight forward to install on the door. Programming codes was a breeze. It did take several tries enabling the z-wave feature, but it finally worked. My smartthings hub identified it immediately and it's working great. I haven't had it long enough to speak on battery life. I'll update my review if necessary. Previous locks I've had but without the z-wave, have had excellent battery life, such as over a year on the same batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. West

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and operate
customer_reviews.text: The system works perfect and everybody is happy with the lock. No more keys to handle and sometimes forget when is too late. My dog walker is very happy and the cleaning lady too. The only thing that I miss is the internet connection to my cell phone. The lock needs a hub, and I do not want to add more expenses. I wish that the lock communicates to my wifi, but that will happen in the next generation.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Rivera-Lanausse

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice in the Gowing IoT World
customer_reviews.text: This lock is really good, not quite outstanding. Install was a breeze, I've installed a number of electronic locks and this was on par with Schlage's other products. Setup with my wink hub was easy, as well as programming codes and remotely locking and unlocking. If I were to suggest a few improvements I would put some sort of tactile feature on the keypad over each number and increase the size of the interior locking knob. We've had a few instances were the lock was confused about being open or closed, but that was solved pretty quickly by cycling the mechanism. Overall I'm impressed and love the remote access and notifications, I would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R

customer_reviews.title: working well with homeseer
customer_reviews.text: I use this product with a homeseer platform and an Aeon z-wave ver.2 stick. I also had experience with the previous version of this lock and vera. This lock installs easily, I like a few minor design changes the made to bulk up the hardware and mountings. Once installed and the lock is working I include it in the network. I have always found with any security lock there is only one option to install them... bring the lock to the controller or the controller to the lock (i use a 65ft usb extension cable since my locks are all on the first floor). The key exchange is lengthy and I could never get a remote install to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Swarmier

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle after 1.5 yrs & Wastes Ton of Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in September 2018, I mistakenly misplaced the actual key assuming I wouldn't need it with this product. DO NOT MISPLACE THE ACTUAL KEY - when the batteries die without you being aware you will be stranded outside! User manual says you will hear a beep warning you of short batter life - WRONG. Battery life is incredibly short. I use brand name batteries only! Doesn't matter which brand you use, this thing will devour them. I started buying in bulk. Also - March 2020 my handle broke! So the only thing keeping my door shut is the deadbolt. Handle completely broken. I live alone, no misuse other than normal wear. I would NOT BUY THIS AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: the battery life on this is absolutely terrible if you use ZWave
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the battery life on this is absolutely terrible if you use ZWave. First set of batteries died within a week. I replaced those with new Lithium batteries, those didn't last much longer. They die so fast that you don't even get a warning through your ZWave device, or an indicator on the lock itself. This means that you will be locked out if you don't change the batteries weekly. Yeah, forget that. Just don't use ZWave and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: i8

customer_reviews.title: Wink goes offline all the time
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I should give this 3 or 4 stars because the lock itself is great but the wink connection goes off line all the time and it’s really annoying. If someone was buying this for a vacation home it would not work because it would always disconnect from the WiFi and the wink. I would not recommend it for anyone who can’t be near it to fix the issue. Just the lock by it self without the wink it’s great l.
customer_reviews.author: Fhockey28

customer_reviews.title: It stands the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock almost two years ago, but am reviewing it now. It was easy to install, easy to integrate with my Samsung SmartThings ecosystem, and most importantly *has worked consistently and reliably ever since the day I bought it* Batteries seem to last just under a year, which is pretty good for a family of 5 with lots of people coming and going.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock for Alarm.com systems
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2GIG GoControl security system that is Alarm.com enabled, and I am happy to report that I was able to add this device to the alarm panel myself using the default installer code. It works flawlessly and I am able to control my front door lock directly from my smart phone. I liked it so much that I bought a second one for the door between the kitchen and garage. The lock seems to be high quality as well. I bought a kit to re-key it to match our existing Schlage locks, which is a piece of cake once you watch a couple of how-to videos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I've bought 5 Schlage locks and I like using them
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 5 Schlage locks and I like using them. I think changing the codes is a bit difficult. I had to call my computer guy to help me change the code. Nexia is the software program that you are suppose to use with the Schlage system. The last two times I called for help they put me on hold for over 20 minutes. I think the Schlage keyless locks are pretty good but changing the codes isn't that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: What a cheap terrible product this is - doesn't even come close to working
customer_reviews.text: Key is stuck in lock, deadbolt does not work from keypad only a motor grinding sound occurs. Online help is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Media Mogul

customer_reviews.title: Kept my son and I safe. Works well and compatible with smart systems.
customer_reviews.text: Great installation instructions and was easy to set up. Connected easily to Samsung Smartthings system as well. I feel so much safer knowing that my parents and childcare providers can enter the household as needed, but if anything changes I can update the code so people can no longer get it. I used it to quickly limit access when I was concerned for the safety of myself and my child. Money well spent. I'd pay for it all over again, and thinking of getting one as a present for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mwango

customer_reviews.title: Secure, quality lock and works with Vivint
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install - but I had to purchase an add-on kit for my 2-1/2” thick door. The Z-wave works seamlessly with Vivint and matches my existing Schlage handle kit perfectly. Battery life is not a problem - just make sure the bolt is properly aligned with the catch in the door frame so that is locks automatically without any extra friction.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! No key fumbling. Control with smart phone. Give diff peeps diff codes
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is a 5 star product.No more key fumbling. I like that I can give a code to different people and know who is using the codes. I use this along with my "Smart Things" device. If i need to let someone in while I am not home, I can unlock the door with my Android smart phone then I can lock it again..
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous hardware failure!
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous! This lock worked well for about a year in an AirBnB I managed—until it didn’t. Recently, the lock had a hardware failure which rendered it unable to unlock, locking my guests inside with no way out. Not through the entry code, not with the manual lever, not with a key. Eventually we had to kick the door down. Imagine if this had happened during a fire? Completely unacceptable, and I won’t be able to trust this lock, or Schlage for that matter, again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Schlage z wave lock
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock, installation a breeze. Just have to understand what is needed as far as the programming/setup. The alarm isn't that great but it does serve its purpose, alerting you to a possible problem. Ease of operation from remote locations is excellent. Hooking up to Alexa also makes it more versatile through the smart things hub. Had people working on my house and was able to let my contractor in and lock the door when he left. Best "TOY" I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works with Nexia, greal look and strong lock
customer_reviews.text: Solid lock that looks great. Works with my Nexia system and Alexa but you cannot unlock the door by voice, only lock by voice command. With Alexa and Nexia, you can verbally check if your doors are locked without getting up. Auto-lock feature is nice too. getting linked to Nexia was a hassle, had to factory reset lock before I could get it to work but it eventually did.
customer_reviews.author: DealMaker

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock overall after trying a few options, this is the best smart lock currently available on the market. Once connected with smart-things it is easy to control remotely and is is easy to use locally. My only complaint is that you have to push to magic "Schlage" button to lock it; a lock icon would have been much better...
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: It installs easily and works well
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine that I'd ever buy any other locking device. It installs easily and works well, doing exactly what it represented it could do. My wife can't keep track of keys and now she doesn't have to... at least our door keys. One big advantage is putting in a combination for relative or handy-man access and then deleting the combination when no longer necessary. I would suggest that anyone who is considering lock replacement take a look at this. We have a bunch of them on two residences. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: crimefighter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for vacation rental units!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great locks! Had it almost a year and still working as expected. Have not try the Z-wave technology yet, as we got them for two vacation units and there is no internet Easy to program, our property manager learned how to add/remove codes. Strongly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shabuboy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work properly
customer_reviews.text: I submitted feedback earlier on this item as it DOES NOT LOCK when you touch the name "SCHLAGE" as it is supposed to do. Sporadically, it will but not consistently; thus, you have to use the key which defeats the purpose of having this lock. Please forward info on how to obtain a substitute. I submitted feedback immediately after discovering this problem but receive no response.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: As usual the schlage locks are better than kwikset locks
customer_reviews.text: As usual the schlage locks are better than kwikset locks. Just the programming alone is wayyyy easier. You don't have to take off the case or anything like that to include or exclude it from your zwave network. A lot of the settings are accessible through my automation controller (ISY). Just all around great! They do need to update the styling a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bxsteez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install and program, looks great, and is packed with fantastic features! I would highly recommend this to others. Update (11/5): I had read a lot of negative reviews about the battery life so I wanted to follow up and say that I have not had to change the batteries since I installed the lock months ago! This lock has been so great for times when I need to let someone in to let my dog out and for my groomer who comes to my house. It has been handy soooo many times. I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I have it hooked up to my SmartThings hub and it's very cool to have it automatically unlock the door when I get home. I have it set so when I open my garage door it will unlock my front door. So I never bring my house keys with me anymore. It unlocks, but if it ever shouldn't work, I can just the code to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed today and it’s a big upgrade from the Kwikset lock I had. Motor seems stronger and lock moves faster. Setup/install instructions were super easy to follow and pairing it with my alarm panel went smoother than expected. I will update review if I run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scootz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems with this lockset. Had to reprogram ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems with this lockset. Had to reprogram the codes 5 times for no obvious reason. Replaced it with an August Door lock.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brofman

customer_reviews.title: Unequaled Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality. Have purchased for other properties as well. This model doesn't have the alarm beep when the door is bumped, however. Watch for that when deciding on a model. I have purchased with and without, both by Schlage. Have purchased only Schlage for years. They remain consistent in quality, reliability, and durability (also have an unbeatable warranty that you won't have to use).
customer_reviews.author: Firestarter

customer_reviews.title: great door lock
customer_reviews.text: wifi enabled. you can use this with the ring security system and amazon alexa app. easy to program manual key codes and delete them as needed. you can also program key codes with your phone through ring app.
customer_reviews.author: kpy product reviews

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Reasons for Home Automation
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Schlage Touchscreeen lock purchase and installation. Both are great. The second install went smoothly. In about 15 minutes the old lock was out, the new one was in, and the system was paired to a SmartThings Hub v2.0. Of interest... the installation paperwork says there may be issues using lithium batteries. I have been using lithium batteries in the first lock, after the batteries wore out, without an issue.. I used the Duracell batteries included in this lock, instead of using lithium. Winter is coming. We will see... Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Z Wave Compatible Deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a very well constructed dead bolt lock with Z Wave support. Since we already have the ADT Pulse system, getting the Sense for $229 or the model with a bult in alaram for $20 more did not make sense (pardon the pun :-) ). If you are looking for HomeKit compatibilty and want to use Siri then go for the Sense model else this one does the job perfectly well. Integration with any Z Wave hub is seamless and the one touch lock feature is excellent. Overall very satisfied and would recommend to anyone looking to get into the Smart Home Game.
customer_reviews.author: Nilanjan M.

customer_reviews.title: Runs through batteries
customer_reviews.text: Buggy. Disconnects from Wink often. Batteries run out in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Book

customer_reviews.title: Almost there.... wanting for more
customer_reviews.text: I am trying very hard to like this. I bought this for my VRBO unit. It installed flawlessly and I can lock and unlock it remotely... But that is it. Nothing more Help. I wanted a lock that would allow me to remotely change the access codes. Did I buy the wrong model? Is this an old version?
customer_reviews.author: Parents

customer_reviews.title: No need for keys!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than Lowes and it actually worked (compared to the one I bought and had to return to the store-turned out it was a "return" from another customer"-nice). We own a rental property and this allows us to let people in without exchanging keys. We have it programmed for a unique code for every family member and it texts us when they go in and out. We have it tied to our Iris system from Lowes and love that product too.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Terranova

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lock -- works great with Nexia, less so with ADT Pulse
customer_reviews.text: I have installed two of these locks, one on a Nexia system and the other on ADT Pulse. It works great on Nexia with full functionality. I can add codes and associate them with different users and delete codes as well. I have programmed alerts so that they inform me which user unlocked the door. It also tracks the state of the batteries. On ADT I can not add or subtract door codes or link them with specific users. It also doesn't track the state of the batteries. Lock installation itself is straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: NHJon

customer_reviews.title: This wasn't too much of a problem because the process to change the battery is really easy and straight forward
customer_reviews.text: Really convenient to have. I think cold weather negatively effects the battery because I had to replace the battery really soon after temps dropped below freezing. This wasn't too much of a problem because the process to change the battery is really easy and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Glamette

customer_reviews.title: This works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 teens, and they can come and go when they want without needing to remember a key, or ring the doorbell. I've had it for quite a while, and I'm still using the first set of batteries. I have not tried to use it with wifi or apple tv, since it works fine for me as it is. Update---------- Its been over a year, and its still working great on the first set of batteries. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: P. Visser

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Wink system. Was very easy to setup and we had it up and running within minutes. Also ordered the Century Front door handle to match with this and they both arrived together within a day. I use the touch keypad a lot and it feels sturdy and works very well. The only thing that keeps me from 5 stars is that I had to "choose" between this Z-Wave version and the Homekit version. Ideally, you would be able to switch between platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: A lock rich with features.
customer_reviews.text: Great 'no worries' deadbolt. Locks itself in 30 seconds, a very nice touchscreen that works well even with gloves on. Pairs well with Wink home automation as well! I always know that my door is locked. Love the guest feature that allows me to set temporary codes. **Note for some reason my first set of batteries died within a week of use. My second set has lasted much longer, about a month so far, could have been bad batteries but worried me for a bit there.
customer_reviews.author: Cyoak

customer_reviews.title: Life is easier when it's keyless.
customer_reviews.text: This lock changed my life. Made coming home a piece of cake when I didn't have to fumble to through my keys while holding about 8 grocery bags in my hands, which I didn't have a choice to carry in multiple trips cause I lived in an apartment building that made the walk from my car to my apartment door lengthy enough that I didn't wanna go back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Andy K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the lock
customer_reviews.text: We love this lock! We often receive compliments on it. Love that it doesn't display fingerprints. We bought a z-wave system, so now it's even better. LOVE not having to carry keys when we go for a walk. I can't speak to the installation, because my husband did that, but it didn't take him very long and his language was pretty clean the whole time. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it so far. I did not do the install, so can't comment on the ease or difficulty of that. Purchased for a commercial building and will probably purchase one for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Fairly easy to install. Uses Z-wave with its security protocol for remote communications. This means that it is possible to use them with a system that does not rely on or expose the physical security of your house to the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Archer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 3 months then it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 3 months then it stopped working. I've changed the batteries. Still doesn't want to work.
customer_reviews.author: HipHip

customer_reviews.title: best investment for piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I like this cause it locks automatically and I'm able to use wink to add temporary codes for my dog sitter as well as open it and lock it from my wink app. Bought two for my front and back door.. easy set up. batteries last about 5-6 months. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel_Hero

customer_reviews.title: Smooth 2 months in
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. 2 months in. Easy to install and set up. Connected to my Wink hub no problem. It's slightly loud when it opens and closes but it does the job. The biggest problem is reminding my family members that they don't need to carry their keys.
customer_reviews.author: gizmonet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks even better. Never could get it to work with the Schlage app but smart things does everything and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler S.

customer_reviews.title: BE468 vs BE469, both great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed BE468 today and it's great, but if you want the alarm feature get the BE469. BE468 does not have the tamper alarm. I have connected this lock to my z-wave network (SmartThings hub). I'm happy with the purchase, but wish I'd ordered the BE469. I didn't know there was a difference.
customer_reviews.author: James Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was my third try with a code deadbolt. Other brands which are cheaper are low quality and just headaches to install. Schlage was pricier but I am really happy. We'll have to see the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: DolceVita

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice lock which is very sturdy and functions well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lock which is very sturdy and functions well. I use it with the Wink hub to control the lock from my smart phone. It keeps a log of when the lock is opened and closed. It was very easy to install and has performed well for the month or so I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Was contemplating on getting either this or the manual one. I’m glad I got this for my home. My wife loves it. I ended up getting the manual one for my business door. Glad I did. I’ve had Many compliments on both doors
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Z-Wave Lock
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described and looks nice as well. Added feature I didn't know about is that it tells your z-wave system if the door is locked or unlocked in addition to being able to lock or unlock it remotely. Schlage makes great products that look sharp, and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Korey Steven Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great convenience and it was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I adore not having to carry keys. I adore the flexibility of this lock. You can assign codes for one time use or for friends. Great convenience and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Work great. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the installation is pretty easy with very descriptive instructions, self tapping screws, and holes that line up easily. No more getting locked out when I take out the garbage ^^
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend, easy to install and use. Works fabulously with Alexa and ring alarm system.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Smooth install and link to Z-wave home automation
customer_reviews.text: Everything went super smooth. We needed a way to provide remote access to cleaners tomorrow and I ordered this lock this afternoon. Thanks to Amazon same day delivery, it arrived by 7 PM the same day. Installed it in about 20 minutes and connected to Z-Wave home automation in another 10 minutes (using Securifi Almond+ as gateway). I am now up and running with all three modes of access - physical key, numeric touchpad keyboard and mobile apps or web. It provides notifications for each entry.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly but need additional door handle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works perfectly. Didn’t realize that one needs matching door handle to complete the install. Would have been nice to have a matching set.
customer_reviews.author: Glastonbury

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works as expected. We use it with a wink hub. I can lock and unlock from my bedroom and review all the unlocks/locks. If you assign names to the codes then you can see whose code was used.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to install and set up
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to install and set up. Only peeve was it took a bit to get it to sync with my network. I have a Wink Hub II. I had to go into exclusion mode before this would sync with my hub. Once it was sync'd, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Frost_Trunks

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Super easy to install (even with an old door and a 1 3/8 hole). Including connecting to my router the whole thing took about 15 minutes. My son loves the keypad entry. It looks great too and matches exactly with rubber bronze schlage hardware we had We hooked up to our Wink and connected to foyer light so it turns on when the door is unlocked. Sa'weet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: after integrating with a Wink hub I can lock/unlock from a wink panel on the wall and lock/unlock remotely with a smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: No more unlocking the front door with a key, more handy and convenient than I expected. Give codes to friends/family, after integrating with a Wink hub I can lock/unlock from a wink panel on the wall and lock/unlock remotely with a smart phone...
customer_reviews.author: Jack Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great security product
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our SmartThings system. Eliminate keys and automatically lock after 30 seconds. System ensures doors are locked when we leave. Installation and Z-wave pairing was easy. We bought two with a Schlage discount. Be sure to get latest model with built-in alarm.
customer_reviews.author: David Baker

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It's easy to control with the keypad, key, or wireless device. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dodi Williams

customer_reviews.title: excellent operation, lasts > 2 years on a single ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd lock of this type. excellent operation, lasts > 2 years on a single 9V battery. I would give 5 stars for a non-iLink version, as I stopped connecting things to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Abramoff

customer_reviews.title: This model does not connect directly to the internet. It is necessary to use an automation Hub.
customer_reviews.text: This model demmands the use of an automation home Hub. If you intend to connect directly to the internet, use the new model. The description does not describe this situation clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sordi

customer_reviews.title: Another product required to operate remotely
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had know you had to buy a hub to get it to work remotely, otherwise easy to program and to install
customer_reviews.author: joc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lock ever! We ve been using it for a couple of months now and love it. It locks by itself after 30 secs which is great for when you are in a hurry and forget to lock the door behind you.
customer_reviews.author: Iheartamazon

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to install, and works exactly as described. The ability to add and delete codes is great. I especially like that you can enter multiple codes. I use this as I rent my property -- I can provide a guest code to a guest and then delete it after their stay while my family code never has to change. Have not used the Z-Wave but excited to know I can enable that at any time to use the lock from my smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perry

customer_reviews.title: " Easy install and setup
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure! No more keys (or forgetting them, or losing them). No more thinking "Did I lock the door?" Easy install and setup. You still get a key to hide in your car or wherever just in case the batteries dies. You can give your guests their own code of their choice so they'll easily remember it.Thanks Schlage for a great lock!
customer_reviews.author: John Balzer

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: The modern styling of these locks looks great and they are very solid. They boast an impressive feature set including Zwave, internal tamper alarm, network able alarms, and multiple PINS. I use them with Home Assistant and they work beautifully and setup was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Z-Wave Lock,  worked great with my SmartThings Hub!
customer_reviews.text: I used these at one of my rentals. Works great and very easy to add to your Zwave control units. I use the Smartthings Brain for my place, and all I had to do was Add Device, and put the lock into programming mode as described in instructions. It found it immediately and now it auto locks for me, allows me to lock/unlock anywhere in the world, and also see it's status.
customer_reviews.author: Oakweb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Batteries run out faster than expected and show 90% then go over night to 0%. But I love it and use it on a vacation rental. So easy to operate. So convenient to give up keys and very easy to program....
customer_reviews.author: devog0718

customer_reviews.title: Old version not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the older version, which does not have the built-in alarm feature. First of all, it's only ANSI Grade II, whereas the new models are Grade I. Second, it's much louder than the newer version we have on our other door. Pass on this for the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome build quality.  Schlage is worth the money. Great with Wink Hub
customer_reviews.text: Awesome build quality. Schlage is worth the money. Super easy to install. Paired incredibly easily with Wink and Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: jack and lena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. is has work so good with ST. you can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Benjamin Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Smart Lock look good
customer_reviews.text: The lock looks great on the antique door. It's easy to use. It's not that easy to change the code. The challenge I'm having is getting it to connect with the digital hub so that I can control it through the internet. That is not so easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lock
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. I don't worry about locking myself out and I can check via my phone whether I remembered to lock the front door
customer_reviews.author: retrosnowwhite1979

customer_reviews.title: Love it, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very easy to use and set up, instructions are very easy to follow. I can't say if it was easy to install because I had someone else doing it for me, but judging by the time he spent and the lack of swearwords, I would say it was pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Grignani

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, secure, easy installation. Keypad feedback is so-so.
customer_reviews.text: Poor 'feedback' on button presses (beeps, but not loud). Easy install, good instructions. Secure lock. Works great. ZWave interface is good. Dependable company.
customer_reviews.author: hcw3

customer_reviews.title: Perfection. Rock solid quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deadbolt. Quick and painless install and pairing with my GE/Alarm.com Z-Wave controller. Note: this picture indicates that the interior "Schlage" icon is a button (that's actually an alarm function). The model that shipped IS NOT equipped with the alarm. If you need that version, do not order this item.
customer_reviews.author: pseudofoodie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised using it mainly for remote access
customer_reviews.text: I've had this integrated into my home network for a few weeks though Works flawlessly. I would add that installing this precisely and correctly is the key for it working without issue. If you intend to install this sloppily or not lined up correctly don't even attempt to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lambert

customer_reviews.title: This lock works beautifully! It is smooth in its operation
customer_reviews.text: This lock works beautifully! It is smooth in its operation , has a large number of codes that can be programmed and is easily run with one hand. I would recommend it to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Annette M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Airbnb usage
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the Wink hub. Excellent for Airbnb usage.
customer_reviews.author: Organic

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it but not as expected this was supposed to work over the internet and dose not
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great. It is not retail package it came in a brown cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Hrang M.

customer_reviews.title: We've used these locks before - they are great! So nice to not have to carry a ...
customer_reviews.text: We've used these locks before - they are great! So nice to not have to carry a key around and helps ensure the door is truly closed for security.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian chica

customer_reviews.title: Love the keyless entry
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyless entry. It's super easy to install and I am so happy that I don't have mess with keys, simply type in the code. Price was also cheaper on Amazon than Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. I have it joined to my SmartThings ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I have it joined to my SmartThings network and can control it remotely including adding/removing or enabling/disabling user codes. The remote control features I mention only work because of the SmartThings integration.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser3541

customer_reviews.title: ... locked the door on my way out from my smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: My life is so much easier now that I don't lock myself out and using the Wink can check to make sure I locked the door on my way out from my smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Alexa and the Wink Hub
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Alexa and the Wink Hub. Took an hour or so to install and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Trombley

customer_reviews.title: works like normal now
customer_reviews.text: We had issues when we first bought it where it wouldn't always lock the first time you hit the button. But it seems to have sorted itself out, works like normal now.
customer_reviews.author: brie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with my SmartThings installation. Perfect addition to a budding smart home.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Adams

customer_reviews.title: This looks and works great. The programming instructions are a little unclear but ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks and works great. The programming instructions are a little unclear but once I figured out the programming it was pretty easy to set-up. The Z wave function works awesome with my Ultrasync system.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Schlage BE468CEN626. Took only 10 mins to install and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Afzal Bhuiyan

product_meta.title: Schlage Lock Company BE468CEN716 Connect Century Touchscreen Deadbolt, Aged Bronze
product_meta.description: Color Name:Aged Bronze| Style:CenturySchlage BE468 Touchscreen Deadbolt At Schlage, we know security. After all, we've been innovating locks for more than 90 years. Now, with the Touchscreen Deadbolt, we've created a door lock that combines all of our best security features into one lock-redefining what it means to be secure. With our innovative touchscreen feature, you have the convenience of going keyless and no longer having keys to lose, hide, carry or forget. The fingerprint-resistant touchscreen ensures numbers won't be detectable to intruders after repeated use-safeguarding your home even more. Durable Resistive Touchscreen - Fingerprint-resistant touchscreen protects against fingerprints and smudges and ensures wear patterns remain undetectable. Built from high quality materials, this keyless deadbolt gives you a high level of security at the main point of entry. Motorized Bolt - Tapered bolt design that automatically locks and unlocks when user code is input. Auto-lock Feature (disabled by default) - If the door is left unlocked the deadbolt will re-lock automatically after 30 seconds, as an added security measure.
feature_bullets: Durable Resistive Touchscreen with matte finish to protect against fingerprints and smudges
Anti-pick shield protects against lock tampering
This product is manufactured in Mexico. Employs Z-Wave, a wireless technology that makes your house smarter, safer and far more convenient

LED backlight for easy keypad access in the dark.Z-Wave Technology connects to your home automation system and lets you lock or unlock your door remotely via the web or smartphone. Requires a Z-wave controller/hub, sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars371 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
